page.title: 15Playground Games. Part 1.
page.content: Whipton Barton First School decided to write about the games that they play in the playground and some of the songs they sing to them. In the playground some of us play clapping games like this...'A sailor went to sea, sea, sea, to see what he could see, see, see, but all that he could see, see, see was the bottom of the deep blue sea, sea, sea'. We also clap to:'My mummy is a baker, yummy, yummy, yummy. My daddy is a dustman, poohy, poohy, poohy. My sister is a showoff, coory, coory, coory. My brother is a cowboy, brag, bang, clap'. We also play other games. The best is Cat and Frog. We also sing 'A sailor went to leg, leg, leg, to see what he could leg, leg, leg, but all that he could leg, leg, leg, was the bottom of the deep blue leg, leg, leg'.
